ecomexpress - Assistant Manager-Talent Acquisition

Location - Gurgaon, Work Type: Full Time

Hr June 16, 2022

Job Description:

Responsibilities:

  • Manage end to end recruitment.
  • Prepare JD with inputs from the leads/HOD.
  • Manage the team of recruiters and assign them daily task.
  • Responsible to source, recruit, and screen applicants for positions.
  • Offer negotiation and closures.
  • Efficient coordination with stakeholders & recruitment agencies.
  • Extensive use of portals like Naukri / Social Media networking like LinkedIn and be part of other related groups to post the open positions and communicate when needed.

Requirements:

  • Involved in IT & Non IT hiring equally, across levels, with excellent negotiation skills.
  • Part of various social media technology groups.
  • Should have team management capability.
  • Good communication / proactive / quick / sense of ownership / commitment to the job/ working within TAT are necessary behavioral attributes.
  • Experience working on spreadsheets and power point presentations.
  • Maintain the recruitment data and update the same on weekly basis.

We are an Equal Opportunity Employer. We source, hire, train, promote, compensate & nurture employees based on their ability to do their job, disregarding other factors i.e., Gender, Race, Ethnicity, Religion, Marital status, Physical Disability and Sexual orientation.

vivriti - Associate

Who we are:

Vivriti is a young, dynamic, and spirited institution that boasts of a large appetite for success through its vision of creating the largest and most valuable platform for enterprise finance. The word ‘Vivriti’ means progress or development and speaks volumes about our passion to continuously strive for results that add value to our ecosystem. At Vivriti, we are mission driven, challenging the status quo each day, reinventing the Indian mid-market debt market space, and creating an industry in itself.
